beginFrames.content: beginFrames → int (Read Only): The beginning point of the segment expressed in frames.

beginSamples.content: beginSamples → int (Read Only): The beginning point of the segment expressed in samples.

beginSeconds.content: beginSeconds → float (Read Only): The beginning point of the segment expressed in seconds.

custom.content: custom → dict (Read Only): dictionary of all the extra column values associated with the segment.

cycle.content: cycle → bool (Read Only): Whether or not the segment will repeat itself.

cycleEndAlertFrames.content: cycleEndAlertFrames → int (Read Only): The amount of time before cycling the callback will be executed, expressed in frames.

cycleEndAlertSamples.content: cycleEndAlertSamples → int (Read Only): The amount of time before cycling the callback will be executed, expressed in samples.

cycleEndAlertSeconds.content: cycleEndAlertSeconds → float (Read Only): The amount of time before cycling the callback will be executed, expressed in seconds.

cycleLimit.content: cycleLimit → bool (Read Only): Whether or not the segment will repeat itself indefinitely.

delayFrames.content: delayFrames → int (Read Only): The delay portion of the segment expressed in frames.

delaySamples.content: delaySamples → int (Read Only): The delay portion of the segment expressed in samples.

delaySeconds.content: delaySeconds → float (Read Only): The delay portion of the segment expressed in seconds.

lengthFrames.content: lengthFrames → int (Read Only): The length portion of the segment expressed in frames.

lengthSamples.content: lengthSamples → int (Read Only): The length portion of the segment expressed in samples.

lengthSeconds.content: lengthSeconds → float (Read Only): The length portion of the segment expressed in seconds.

maxCycles.content: maxCycles → int (Read Only): The maximum number of repetitions.

owner.content: owner → OP (Read Only): The OP to which this object belongs.

row.content: row → int (Read Only): Named tuple of all the parameter or column values describing the segment.

speed.content: speed → float (Read Only): The speed multiplier of the segment.

index.content: index → int (Read Only): The numeric index of this segment.
